Sentencas: The gas-tightness and high ionic conductivity of the electrolyte are essential requirements for realization of high efficiency and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: In this study, the microstructure of yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte films sintered on a rigid substrate was characterized using scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: The pore size, shape and orientation were quantitatively determined based on image analysis of SEM micrographs.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: It was found that the pores are elongated and oriented preferentially perpendicular to the film plane.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: The average pore size was found to increase, while the pore elongation and preferential orientation decrease with sintering.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: A variational principle-based sintering model capable of predicting microstructural evolution is presented.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: The modelling results agree with the experimental observations in that constrained sintering leads to an anisotropic microstructure which becomes more isotropic with densification.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: Decreasing grain boundary diffusion with respect to surface diffusion is predicted to produce a more isotropic pore geometry.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: The model also predicts that in constrained sintering there exists a critical pore size above which the pore grows instead of shrinks.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling

Sentencas: It is critical to control defect size at an early stage of processing to be smaller than the critical pore size in order to obtain leak-free electrolyte films.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution in thin zirconia films: Experimental observation and modelling
